vernac_cmds: Require Import Setoid Morphisms RelationClasses Omega.
From ChargeCore.Logics Require Import ILogic ILInsts ILEmbed.
Class ILLOperators (A : Type) : Type := { illater : A -> A }.

Class ILLater {ILLOps: ILLOperators A} : Type := { illogic :> ILogic A; spec_lob P : illater P |-- P -> |-- P; spec_later_weaken P : P |-- illater P; spec_later_impl P Q : illater (P -->> Q) -|- (illater P) -->> (illater Q); spec_later_forall {T} (F : T -> A) : illater (Forall x:T, F x) -|- Forall x:T, illater (F x); spec_later_exists {T} (F : T -> A) : Exists x : T, illater (F x) |-- illater (Exists x : T, F x); spec_later_exists_inhabited {T} (F : T -> A) : inhabited T -> illater (Exists x : T, F x) |-- Exists x : T, illater (F x) }.
Global Instance spec_later_entails: Proper (lentails ==> lentails) illater.
Global Instance spec_later_equiv: Proper (lequiv ==> lequiv) illater.
do 2 rewrite land_is_forall; rewrite spec_later_forall; split; apply lforallR; intro x; apply lforallL with x; destruct x; reflexivity.
do 2 rewrite lor_is_exists; split; [rewrite spec_later_exists_inhabited; [|firstorder]| rewrite <- spec_later_exists]; apply lexistsL; intro x; apply lexistsR with x; destruct x; reflexivity.
apply lforallR; intro x; destruct x.
Global Program Instance ILLaterNatOps : ILLOperators (ILPreFrm ge A) := {| illater P := mkILPreFrm (fun x => Forall y : nat, Forall H : y < x, (ILPreFrm_pred P) y) _ |}.
apply lforallR; intro x; apply lforallR; intro Hx; apply lforallL with x.
Global Instance ILLaterNat : ILLater (ILPreFrm ge A).
intros P H x; induction x.
rewrite <- H; simpl; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hy; omega.
rewrite <- H; simpl; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hy.
intros P x; simpl; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx.
intros P Q; split; intros x; simpl.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hxy.
apply lforallR; intro z; apply lforallR; intro Hzy.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx; apply lforallR; intro z; apply lforallR; intro Hyz.
apply lforallR; intro a; apply lforallR; intro Ha.
apply lforallL with z; apply lforallL; [omega | reflexivity].
intros T F; split; simpl; intros x.
apply lforallR; intro a; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx.
apply lforallL with y; apply lforallL with Hyx; apply lforallL with a.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx; apply lforallR; intro a.
apply lforallL with a; apply lforallL with y; apply lforallL with Hyx.
apply lexistsL; intro a; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro H.
apply lforallL with y; apply lforallL with H; apply lexistsR with a.
intros T F Hin x; simpl.
apply lexistsR with a; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro H; omega.
apply lexistsL; intro b; apply lexistsR with b.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro H.
Context T (ord: relation T) {ord_Pre: PreOrder ord}.
Global Program Instance ILLaterPreOps : ILLOperators (ILPreFrm ord A) := {| illater P := mkILPreFrm (fun t => |>((ILPreFrm_pred P) t)) _ |}.
Program Definition ILLaterPre : ILLater (ILPreFrm ord A).
intros P Q; split; intros x; simpl; setoid_rewrite <- spec_later_impl; do 2 setoid_rewrite spec_later_forall; reflexivity.
intros B F; split; intros x; simpl; apply spec_later_forall.
intros B F x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists.
intros B F I x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists_inhabited; apply I.
Program Instance ILLaterFunOps : ILLOperators (Fun T A) := {| illater P := fun t => |>(P t) |}.
Program Definition ILLaterFun : ILLater (Fun T A).
intros P Q; split; intros x; simpl; apply spec_later_impl.
intros B F; split; intros x; simpl; apply spec_later_forall.
intros B F x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists.
intros B F I x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists_inhabited; apply I.

command: do 2 rewrite land_is_forall; rewrite spec_later_forall; split; apply lforallR; intro x; apply lforallL with x; destruct x; reflexivity.
do 2 rewrite lor_is_exists; split; [rewrite spec_later_exists_inhabited; [|firstorder]| rewrite <- spec_later_exists]; apply lexistsL; intro x; apply lexistsR with x; destruct x; reflexivity.
apply lforallR; intro x; destruct x.
apply lforallR; intro x; apply lforallR; intro Hx; apply lforallL with x.
intros P H x; induction x.
rewrite <- H; simpl; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hy; omega.
rewrite <- H; simpl; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hy.
intros P x; simpl; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx.
intros P Q; split; intros x; simpl.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hxy.
apply lforallR; intro z; apply lforallR; intro Hzy.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx; apply lforallR; intro z; apply lforallR; intro Hyz.
apply lforallR; intro a; apply lforallR; intro Ha.
apply lforallL with z; apply lforallL; [omega | reflexivity].
intros T F; split; simpl; intros x.
apply lforallR; intro a; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx.
apply lforallL with y; apply lforallL with Hyx; apply lforallL with a.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro Hyx; apply lforallR; intro a.
apply lforallL with a; apply lforallL with y; apply lforallL with Hyx.
apply lexistsL; intro a; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro H.
apply lforallL with y; apply lforallL with H; apply lexistsR with a.
intros T F Hin x; simpl.
apply lexistsR with a; apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro H; omega.
apply lexistsL; intro b; apply lexistsR with b.
apply lforallR; intro y; apply lforallR; intro H.
intros P Q; split; intros x; simpl; setoid_rewrite <- spec_later_impl; do 2 setoid_rewrite spec_later_forall; reflexivity.
intros B F; split; intros x; simpl; apply spec_later_forall.
intros B F x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists.
intros B F I x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists_inhabited; apply I.
intros P Q; split; intros x; simpl; apply spec_later_impl.
intros B F; split; intros x; simpl; apply spec_later_forall.
intros B F x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists.
intros B F I x; simpl; apply spec_later_exists_inhabited; apply I.
